snippet: Robin Roberts, who had already told the “Good Morning America” audience that she was taking a medical leave for a bone marrow transplant, rushed to storm-torn Mississippi to be with her ailing mother.
abstract: Lucimarian Roberts, mother of Good Morning America co-host Robin Roberts, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: Robin Roberts, who had already told the “Good Morning America” audience that she was taking a medical leave for a bone marrow transplant, rushed to storm-torn Mississippi to be with her ailing mother.

headline.seo: Lucimarian Roberts, Mother of Robin Roberts, Dies at 88
headline.main: Lucimarian Roberts, Mother of ABC News Host, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Lucimarian Roberts, 88, Mother of News Host
